scripts.gcloud:config: gcloud config set project yourproject && gcloud auth configure-docker && gcloud auth configure-docker asia-northeast1-docker.pkg.dev
scripts.gcloud:deploy: gcloud run deploy template-app --image gcr.io/yourproject/template-app --platform managed --region asia-northeast1 --allow-unauthenticated --update-secrets AGORA_APP_ID=AGORA_APP_ID:latest,AGORA_APP_CERTIFICATE=AGORA_APP_CERTIFICATE:latest
scripts.auth: npm run gcloud:config && npm run gcloud:activate
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run docker:build:cloud && npm run docker:push && npm run gcloud:deploy
